title.narrative: Brazil: providing clear oil and gas decommissioning guidance to develop a strong regulatory framework, guide sustainable sector development and protect the environment

description.narrative: By providing guidance on oil and gas decommission to develop a regulatory framework, the project will help update the Brazilian offshore oil & gas regulatory framework on operational safety, environmental protection and cost effectiveness, setting clear decommissioning guidance for the industry. This will also make the sector more attractive for international companies.
